page.title: 18Life in Wall Heath [1]
page.content: My name is Lee Knowles.I am 13 years old and I am 5 foot 3.I have a sister called Zena who is 10.My mom is called Maureen and my dad is called Graham.He works for West Midlands Gas in Birmingham.We used to live in Stourbridge but four years ago we moved to Wall Heath.We have two cars,a W reg Allegro and an A reg Maestro which is metallic green.We have a push button telephone, a colour television and a Vic 20 computer.I do not shop in Kingswinford but in Stourbridge because there is a wider range of shops.I support Stourbridge Football and Cricket teams.There is one thing I do not like about Kingswinford and that is the leisure facilities.All we have is a bowling green and that does the youngster a lot of good! My favourite programmes are Cricket Test Match on TV and Breakfast Show on Beacon Radio.
